dict.acceptation: 语言，语言文字；表达能力；言语，语风，文风，文体；专门用语，术语；

sent.orig: One of the most empowering new components of DirectX 9.0 is the High-Level Shader Language(HLSL).
sent.trans: 高层着色语言(H igh-Level Shader Language,HLSL)是D irectX 9.0最强有力的新组件之一。

sent.orig: The E-language project was started to meet the need of this new trend.
sent.trans: 正是应这种需求，两国启动了e-language计划。

sent.orig: Language, generally speaking, contains language, spoken language and behavior language.
sent.trans: 语言，一般说来包括书面语、口语和行为语等。

sent.orig: The non-language human relations' way are many, like vice-language, object language, environment language and so on.
sent.trans: 非语言交际的方式很多，如副语言、客体语言、环境语言等。本文重点探讨与身体有关的一种非语言交际方式———身势语。

sent.orig: Computer programming language development, experience from the machine language, assembly language to advanced language course.
sent.trans: 计算机程序设计语言的发展，经历了从机器语言、汇编语言到高级语言的历程。
